A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This is one of my favorite Star Wars movies\, I won't go over everything I loved but I will say some specific things. 

SPOILERS

Ok so the main things I want to say is that the long timeline with Finn and Rose was NOT useless! This timeline set up the whole part where the Empire discovers the transports and kills off most of the resistance. Also it sets up how Po is a complete idiot because he's the one who told them and their hacker buddy (who was the one who told the empire).
